entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming northwest 30 this evening. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 04 January 2023
